CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 一段时间；片刻；暂时；一会儿；时期；时光；间隔；阶段
在…期间；当…时候；与…同时；尽管；虽然；（对比两件事物）…而；…然而；到…时

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指尽管作出完全让步，也不会发生任何影响。
口语常用词，语气较强，泛指与前述情况相反。
表转折关系，语气稍弱于but，连接性也弱一些，因而常作插入语。
语气强，多用于肯定句或疑问句。指尽管作出让步，采取措施或表示反对，但情况仍然如故，无所改变。
表对比，一般可与whereas换用，但程度弱一些。
常用于否定句，语气比still稍强。指不管作出多大努力或让步，仍达不到预期的结果。

word_group.brief_definition: 片刻之后；一会后；一阵子之后
很久, 半晌, 好一阵

word_group.phrase: strike while the iron is hot

word_group.brief_definition: 抓紧时机, 趁热打铁
word_group.phrase: make hay while the sun shines

word_group.brief_definition: 猫儿不在；老鼠玩得自在
word_group.phrase: while the cat's away, the mice will play

word_group.brief_definition: 需要一段时间；会费一段时间

bilingual.source: Can I use yours for a while?

bilingual.target: 学生们可以在唱歌时拍手。
当我们等待时，我们盖住了他。

bilingual.source: He learned to walk while I was away.
bilingual.target: 当我不在时，他学会了走路。

bilingual.source: While smoke is puffing from its head.
bilingual.target: 同时烟雾从它的头部冒出。

list.abstract: while，循环语句，是计算机的一种基本循环模式。当满足条件时进入循环，不满足跳出。
《While》是韩国女子演唱组合GFriend于2015年1月15日发行的迷你一辑《Season of glass》中的收录曲曲。 《Glass Bead》是由曾经创作歌手Ailee的《Heaven》、橙子焦糖的《Catallena》等热门曲目的作曲家李奇、徐勇裴为GFriend量身打造，歌曲散发着GFriend独有的健康明朗魅力，令人期待

yingyinNormal.en: You mind if we stay up a while?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你介意我们在这里先待一会儿吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Wait in the hall while I change.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我换件衣服，你在走廊等着。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm going out for a while. Okay.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我要出去会。好的。

yingyinNormal.en: They kept your room for a while.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们也保留你房间有一阵子。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, it was fun while it lasted.
yingyinNormal.zh: 刚刚确实很好玩。
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge Out of Water》

yingyinNormal.en: In my apartment, while I was sleeping?
yingyinNormal.zh: 在我的房间，在我睡觉的时候？

yingyinNormal.en: Anybody come to adopt us while we were out?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们不在的时候 有人来领养我们吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Would you like us to stick around for a while?
yingyinNormal.zh: 您介不介意我们先逗留一阵子？

yingyinNormal.en: Don't worry. After a while, you'll tune it out.
yingyinNormal.zh: 别担心，等一下你就会习惯了。

yingyinNormal.en: While he continues to antagonize them publicly.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他可是在公然挑衅。

yingyinNormal.en: You go and dry yourselves while I polish the car.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们去弄干衣服，我来擦擦车。

yingyinNormal.en: Will you meet Tony Gillingham while you're there?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你会顺道去见见托尼·吉利安姆吗？

yingyinNormal.en: You just eat your dinner here while you're waiting.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你可以一边等，一边吃饭。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, so, while Claire fixes robot Phil, I make toast.
yingyinNormal.zh: 克莱尔检查机器人菲尔故障的同时，我来先致个辞。

yingyinNormal.en: We're cutting budgets while the barbarians are at the gate.
yingyinNormal.zh: 敌人都打上门来了，还在削减预算。

yingyinNormal.en: While other places have ponies or parrots, we have dragons.
yingyinNormal.zh: 其它地方的宠物是小马和鹦鹉，我们的却是巨龙。

yingyinNormal.en: While the butter mixture melts, blend together the other ingredients.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当奶油融化时，加入其他的原料搅拌一下。

yingyinNormal.en: So we're actually improving the environment while we're making electricity.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以我们在发电的同时也要改善环境。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, while you "mmm" on it for a while, I'm gonna go find a place for my new lamp.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你支支吾吾的时候，我会为我的新台灯找个地方放。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, sweetie, if you're gonna screw things up, it's gonna be while you're here, not while you're away.
yingyinNormal.zh: 亲爱的，一般会破坏感情都是你在的时候，你不在时万事大吉。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: n. 一会儿；一段时间；同时；与此同时；暂时；片刻；在此期间

sense_info_list.en: despite the fact that; in spite of

examination_example.sentence: Still, <highlight>while</highlight> every parent would like to be patient, this is no easy task.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管每个父母都想要有耐心，但这并非易事。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>While</highlight> their parents were content to work long hours, young people value flexibility.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然他们的父母满足于长时间工作，但年轻人更看重弹性。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>While</highlight> 1% may seem insignificant, it is not so to a geneticist.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 1%尽管看起来微不足道，但对遗传学家来说并非如此。

examination_example.sentence: Inevitable distractions often render the daily to-do list ineffective, <highlight>while</highlight> leaving room for improvisation in such a list can reap the best results.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不可避免的分心往往会使每天的待办事项列表无效，而在这样的列表中留出即兴发挥的空间，可以获得最好的结果。

examination_example.sentence: Parents would be looking at their emails <highlight>while</highlight> the children would be making excited bids for their attention.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 父母会看着他们的电子邮件，而孩子们会兴奋地吸引他们的注意力。

examination_example.sentence: The divorced male doesn't have a waiting period before he can remarry <highlight>while</highlight> the woman must wait ten months.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 离过婚的男性在再婚前没有等待期，而女性则必须等待10个月。

sense_info_list.en: during the time that; at the same time as

examination_example.sentence: "We don't make anything anymore," he told Fox News, <highlight>while</highlight> defending his own made-in-Mexico clothing line.
examination_example.sentence_trans: “我们不再生产任何东西了，”他对福克斯新闻说，同时为自己在墨西哥制造的服装品牌辩护。

examination_example.sentence: Half a century of town and country planning has enabled it to retain an enviable rural coherence, <highlight>while</highlight> still permitting low-density urban living.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 半个世纪的城乡规划使其保持了令人羡慕的乡村一致性。

examination_example.sentence: Between 1908 and 1915, about 7 million people arrived <highlight>while</highlight> about 2 million departed.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在1908年和1915年之间，大约有700万人来，200万人离开。

examination_example.sentence: It takes a <highlight>while</highlight> to judge complex aspects of personality, like neuroticism or open-mindedness.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 判断性格的复杂方面需要一段时间，比如神经质或思想开放。

examination_example.sentence: We need them to imagine the United States as a place where they can be productive for a <highlight>while</highlight> without committing themselves to staying forever.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们需要他们把美国想象成一个他们可以在一段时间内高效工作而不会承诺永远呆在那里的地方。

word_usage.usage: while作连词表示“当……时，在……期间”时，指在某事发生之际或发生的过程中，另一事又发生。所引导的状语从句中，谓语应为延续性动词，而不用瞬时动词，强调其动作与主句中的动作同时发生，但持续时间一般较长；有时也可指主句的动作在从句的动作过程中发生。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: during the time that; at the same time as

examination_example.sentence: Children learn to appreciate art works most effectively <highlight>while</highlight> they are playing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 孩子们在玩耍的时候最有效地学习欣赏艺术作品。

examination_example.sentence: Another reason for dolphins keeping their eyes open during sleep is that they can look out for predators <highlight>while</highlight> asleep.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 海豚在睡觉时睁大眼睛的另一个原因是，它们可以在睡觉时留意捕食者。

examination_example.sentence: Development agencies disagree regarding how to tackle environment issues <highlight>while</highlight> ensuring economic progress.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对于如何在确保经济进步的同时解决环境问题，发展机构意见不一。

sense_info_list.en: despite the fact that; in spite of

examination_example.sentence: And <highlight>while</highlight> you may forgive your smart phone an occasional fault, you probably have less patience for error messages from your door lock.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然你可能会原谅你的智能手机偶尔出现的故障，但你可能对你的门锁发出的错误信息更没有耐心。

examination_example.sentence: And <highlight>while</highlight> assessments vary widely, geologists estimate that Antarctica holds at least 36 billion barrels of oil and natural gas.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管评估结果差异很大，但地质学家估计南极洲至少拥有360亿桶石油和天然气。

examination_example.sentence: But <highlight>while</highlight> the number of advertisements may have dipped, there has been a rapid spread of eco-labeling.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是，尽管广告的数量可能有所下降，但生态标签已经迅速传播开来。

examination_example.sentence: Our customers come in and enjoy their food and drinks <highlight>while</highlight> little rabbit play about and brush against their legs.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们的顾客进来享受他们的食物和饮料，而小兔子在他们的腿上玩耍和轻蹭。

examination_example.sentence: Now they are introducing new Barbies with three slightly different body shapes, <highlight>while</highlight> the original, tall and thin Barbies will continue to be sold.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 现在，他们正在推出三种不同体型的新芭比娃娃，而原有的高瘦芭比娃娃将继续销售。

examination_example.sentence: Most affluent parents enroll their children in preschool or day care, <highlight>while</highlight> low-income parents are more likely to depend on family members.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大多数富裕的父母会把孩子送到幼儿园或日托所，而低收入的父母更有可能依靠家庭成员。

examination_example.sentence: As I lay there a <highlight>while</highlight>, I drifted into a dream-like state and fantasized about what she looked like.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当我在那里躺了一会儿后，我不知不觉陷入了一个类似梦境的状态，幻想着她的样子。

examination_example.sentence: It knocks at your door only once in a <highlight>while</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它只是偶尔会敲你的门一次。

examination_example.sentence: They will take advantage of the time to rest a <highlight>while</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们会利用这段时间休息一会儿。

word_usage.usage: while作连词时，表示“当...时”，常用来引导时间状语从句。当主句的主语和while所引导的从句的主语一致时，while从句中的主语、谓语往往可省去。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: n. 一会儿；一段时间；同时；与此同时；暂时；片刻；在此期间

sense_info_list.en: during the time that; at the same time as

examination_example.sentence: What does the woman have to do <highlight>while</highlight> the paint job is being done?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 油漆工作进行时，女士需要做什么？

examination_example.sentence: Researchers think that one explanation is that ties to friends are broken <highlight>while</highlight> academic demands are rising.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 研究人员认为，一种解释是，当学术需求上升时，与朋友的联系被打破了。

examination_example.sentence: For instance, you can move a TV to the kitchen and watch your favorite shows <highlight>while</highlight> you're standing at the sink.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 例如，你可以把电视移到厨房，站在水槽边看你最喜欢的节目。

sense_info_list.en: despite the fact that; in spite of

examination_example.sentence: But <highlight>while</highlight> they knew Prickles was alive, they couldn't find her and never expected her to return by herself.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是，尽管他们知道普里克尔斯还活着，但他们找不到她，也从未指望她会自己回来。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>While</highlight> cheek-kissing for Latin Americans is also a universal greeting form, it does not require such a high degree of relational closeness.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然对拉丁美洲人来说，亲脸颊也是一种普遍的问候形式，但它并不需要如此程度的关系亲密。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>While</highlight> there's little innovation when it comes to passport cover color, the same cannot be said for the pages.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然护照封面的颜色没有什么创新，但内页就不一样了。

examination_example.sentence: Switzerland's passport is dark red, for example, <highlight>while</highlight> most European countries prefer a shade of red.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 例如，瑞士的护照是深红色的，而大多数欧洲国家更喜欢红色。

examination_example.sentence: Half of these are behavioural disorders, <highlight>while</highlight> one third are emotional disorders, which often become outwardly apparent through self-harm.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 其中一半是行为障碍，三分之一是情绪障碍，如压力、焦虑和抑郁，通常通过自我伤害表现出来。

examination_example.sentence: One group of subjects did a boring activity first, <highlight>while</highlight> the others went straight to the creative task.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一组受试者需首先做一份枯燥的工作，而另一组则直接从事创造性的工作。

examination_example.sentence: No, I actually owned a car for a little <highlight>while</highlight> when I lived in Miami.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不，我在迈阿密住的时候确实有一段时间有一辆车。

examination_example.sentence: Well, for a <highlight>while</highlight> now, I've been regularly buying home design magazines.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一段时间以来，我一直定期购买家居设计杂志。

examination_example.sentence: The experimenter called one of the phones and let it ring for a <highlight>while</highlight> before hanging up.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 实验者打了其中一个电话，让它响了一会儿，然后挂断。

word_usage.usage: while作连词时，表示“当...时”，常用来引导时间状语从句。当主句的主语和while所引导的从句的主语一致时，while从句中的主语、谓语往往可省去。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>While</highlight> you're in China, Mount Huangshan is a must to visit!
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当你在中国的时候，黄山是必游之地！

examination_example.sentence: They put some rice into a pot of water and left it to boil <highlight>while</highlight> they made the French toast.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们把一些米饭放进一壶水中，煮沸它的同时，他们做了法式吐司。

examination_example.sentence: He was fishing <highlight>while</highlight> his kids were having a swim.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他在钓鱼，而他的孩子们在游泳。

examination_example.sentence: That season, I broke all of Miller's records <highlight>while</highlight> he watched the home games from the bench.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那个赛季，当米勒坐在板凳上看主场比赛时，我打破了他的所有记录。

examination_example.sentence: I was considering this <highlight>while</highlight> working as a nurse just a few weeks ago.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 几周前当护士的时候我就在考虑这个问题。

examination_example.sentence: My brother, of course, raced off to be with his friends, <highlight>while</highlight> I had plenty to do myself.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当然，我哥哥跑去和他的朋友们待在了一起，而我自己有很多事情要做。

examination_example.sentence: The coach is able to focus on the kids <highlight>while</highlight> the other parents are relieved to be off the hook for another season.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 教练可以把注意力集中在孩子身上，而其他家长则可以松一口气，不用再为下一个赛季操心了。

examination_example.sentence: Has it been a <highlight>while</highlight> since your last visit to a public library?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你有一段时间没去公共图书馆了吗？

examination_example.sentence: Jane, I'm going out for a <highlight>while</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 简，我要出去一会儿。

examination_example.sentence: It clearly showed that <highlight>while</highlight> likability can lead to healthy adjustment, high status has just the opposite effect on us.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这清楚地表明，虽然讨人喜欢可以带给我们良好的适应能力，但高地位对我们的影响恰恰相反。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>While</highlight> all of them are useful, they can get a little complex.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然它们都很有用，但它们可能会变得有点复杂。

examination_example.sentence: I had advised the kids that <highlight>while</highlight> verbs may seem dull, most of the fun things they do will be verbs.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我曾告诉孩子们，虽然动词似乎很枯燥，但他们自己一生中做的大多数有趣的事情都和动词有关。

word_usage.usage: while作连词时，表示“当...时”，常用来引导时间状语从句。当主句的主语和while所引导的从句的主语一致时，while从句中的主语、谓语往往可省去。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 片刻之后；一会后；一阵子之后

sense_info_list.en: during the time that; at the same time as

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>While</highlight> eating and drinking, we talked about the beautiful forest we once had.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 边吃边喝，我们聊起了曾经拥有的美丽森林。

examination_example.sentence: Three buses went by without stopping <highlight>while</highlight> I was waiting at the bus stop.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当我在公共汽车站等车时，三辆公共汽车经过，没有停下。

examination_example.sentence: A woman tied (系) a rope around herself <highlight>while</highlight> a man at the cliff top held the rope.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一个女人在自己身上绑了一根绳子，而悬崖顶上的一个男人拿着绳子。

examination_example.sentence: He kept smiling <highlight>while</highlight> the others complained.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当其他人抱怨时，他一直保持微笑。

examination_example.sentence: Blaming will make things worse, <highlight>while</highlight> positive words are helpful especially when being in trouble or in need.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 责备会让事情变得更糟，而积极的话语是有帮助的，尤其是在遇到麻烦或需要帮助的时候。

examination_example.sentence: I saw a withered flower, <highlight>while</highlight> he"saw"a beautiful flower.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我看到了一朵枯萎的花，而他“看到”了一朵美丽的花。

examination_example.sentence: They make many parts almost dark, <highlight>while</highlight> bright sunlight is above and around them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它们（厚厚的树枝）使得许多地方几乎漆黑一片，然而树枝上方和周围阳光明媚。

examination_example.sentence: After a <highlight>while</highlight>, she said, "Alice! Stop crying! Crying doesn't help! Dry your tears immediately!"
examination_example.sentence_trans: 过了一会儿，她说：“爱丽丝！别哭了！哭也没用！马上擦干眼泪！”

examination_example.sentence: The website even stopped working for a <highlight>while</highlight> because too many people visited it at the same time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 由于太多人同时访问，该网站甚至一度停止工作。

examination_example.sentence: We sat together for a <highlight>while</highlight> after Coco's death, explaining that animal lives are shorter than human lives.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 可可死后，我们在一起坐了一会儿，解释说动物的寿命比人类短。

sense_info_list.en: despite the fact that; in spite of

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>While</highlight> it is famous for its beautiful views, parts of the mountain are facing a problem: rubbish.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然它以美丽的风景而闻名，但这座山的部分区域正面临一个问题：垃圾。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>While</highlight> many dancers start at the age of three, Copeland only began to study ballet in 1995 as a thirteen-year-old girl.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然许多舞蹈演员从3岁开始，但科普兰直到1995年，作为一个13岁的女孩时，才开始学习芭蕾。

word_usage.usage: while作连词时，表示“当...时”，常用来引导时间状语从句。当主句的主语和while所引导的从句的主语一致时，while从句中的主语、谓语往往可省去。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 所引导的从句，其谓语动词既可是持续动词，也可是短暂动词；谓语动词动作发生的时间可以与主句谓语动词的动作是同时，或之前、之后。
句中的谓语动词应为持续动词，不用短暂动词，谓语动作发生的时间通常与主句谓语动词动作发生时间是同时。
侧重指从句与主句的动作同时进行，谓语动词可以是持续性的，可以是短暂性动词。
口语常用词，语气较强，泛指与前述情况相反。
表转折关系，语气稍弱于but，连接性也弱一些，因而常作插入语。
语气强，多用于肯定句或疑问句。指尽管作出让步，采取措施或表示反对，但情况仍然如故，无所改变。
常用于否定句，语气比still稍强。指不管作出多大努力或让步，仍达不到预期的结果。
